detectors.description:
YFIProductToken.YFIProductToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#19-27) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- initialBalance = 1000000000000000000 * 100000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#24)
	- totalSupply += initialBalance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#26)

detectors.description:
YFIProductToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#32-43) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#33-35)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#36)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#37)

detectors.description:
YFIProductToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#44-60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[_from] >= _amount && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#49-52)
	- balances[_from] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#53)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#54)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFIProductToken__1.sol#55)
